page.title: 16BROOMFIELD HOSPITAL III
page.content: In{Broomfield Hospital}staff have{ {bleepers}on their belts so that they can be contacted at all times if they are within two miles. If someone has a heart-attack the staff dial 2222 which goes to the switch-board.The operator presses a button and all{ {bleepers}go off. In the{operating-theatre}you have to wear special clothing because of hygiene.The{Hospital}provides these clothes through an automatic uniform dispenser. The doctor or nurse puts a plastic card into a machine which delivers a fresh uniform. The{Hospital}has a{HSDU}.This stands{ for{Hospital Sterilising Disinfectant {Unit.}Surgical instruments are sterilised in an auto-clave which heats them to a temperature of 134 celcius at zero pressure.
